In Mel Gibson

…George Miller’s futuristic action film Mad Max. His portrayal of a mentally disabled handyman in the romance Tim (1979) earned Gibson the Australian Film Institute’s award for best actor. He won the award again in 1981 for his performance in the World War I drama Gallipoli.
